attributes.action: I wish to protest that BT is excluding Industrial Estates from its BT Infinity high-speed broadband rollout
attributes.additional_details:
It would seem that BT are engaged in a cynical abuse of their power by excluding Industrial Estates from the now well-established ‘Infinity’ high-speed internet access. It is routinely offered in many residential areas but Industrial Estates embedded in that same area are ignored leaving them with only highly expensive custom installation options which are unaffordable for small businesses. This petition demands that government steps in and ensures that  BT offers the same high-speed internet as is being offered to adjacent residential properties. For a deeper explanation of the issues see for example:
 http://www.bournemouthecho.co.uk/news/10493381.Business_owner__Why_is_industrial_estate_being_deprived_of_superfast_broadband_/
